notAcceptEffecty: We do not accept cash. Find out why
welcomeText: We're excited to have you back at
registerSub: Sign up and discover a world of benefits.
subNotEffectiveHeader: At MOMO Coffee, we are committed to the continuous improvement of our services and the safety of our customers and employees. That is why we do not handle cash:
subNotEffectiveFooter: We are committed to providing an efficient, secure and modern shopping experience. For inquiries, please contact us without hesitation.
subListOne: We improve hygiene conditions and avoid product contamination.
subListTwo: We speed up our operations so that you receive your coffee in just a few minutes.
subListThree: We reduce the risks associated with theft of premises and our customers.
acceptTerms: Accept our Privacy Terms and Conditions
baristaTipText: Baristas are the stars of our work
noTip: I don't want to tip today
name: Name
followInstructions: by following the instructions on the payment terminal.
tryAgainText: Your payment could not be processed.Please verify your card and try again,If you can't, consider another card or payment method.
problemHelp: If there is a problem, we are here to help you
successPayment: ¡Payment received successfully! Your order is in process.
receipt: How do you prefer your receipt?
receiptSent: Your receipt has been sent correctly.
orderClientOk: Your order is being prepared and in a few minutes you will have the best of MOMO in your hands.
questions: If you have questions, we are here to help!
thanksText: In a few minutes you will have the best of MOMO in your hands Help us with your name to call you when your order is ready, or when your order is ready, or sign up to take advantage of exclusive benefits!
momoPrivacy: At MoMo, we take care of your privacy.
momoPrivacyData: Here we explain how we handle your data:
termOne: Your Data: We collect your name, email and phone number to provide you with our services and send you amazing promotions.
termTwo: Security: Your data is safe with us. We use security measures to protect it.
termThree: Your Privacy: We do not share your information with anyone else. Your trust is important to us.
termFour: Your Rights: You are in control. You can access, correct or delete your data whenever you want.
